title: Smoked Salmon and Pesto Spaghetti
ingredients: ['150g smoked salmon, cut into small pieces', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '150g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '175ml basil pesto', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '4 tablespoons water', '225g spaghetti']
